Hi (b)(6); (b)(7)(C),
sorry I forgot to CC you on this e-mail.
Thank you,
(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
>>> (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @ocme.nyc.gov> 9/10/2019 12:14 PM >>>
Thank you; we will be in touch when we are able to fulfill your request.
(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
General Counsel
Office of Chief Medical Examiner
421 E. 26th Street
New York, NY 10016
Tel: 212-323-(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
The information contained in this e-mail communication may be confidential and/or legally privileged and is for the use of the intended recipient only. If you are not the intended recipient, or an authorized employee or an agent responsible for delivering it to the intended recipient, the dissemination, distribution or reproduction of this communication or its contents (including any attachments) is prohibited. If you have received this communication in error, please notify us immediately by telephone or reply e-mail and permanently delete it and any copies from your system files.
From: (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov>
Sent: Tuesday, September 10, 2019 12:10 PM
To: (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) (OCME) (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @ocme.nyc.gov>
Cc: (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov> (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov>
Subject: Fwd: Signed Autopsy Request Letter
Hi (b)(6); (b)(7)(C),
per our conversation this morning I am sending you the Letter for requested information involving Mr. Jeffrey Epstein. We need the following: 1. Autopsy Report, 2. Discharge Summary Report, 3. Toxicology Report and 4. Death Certificate. We need these documents to finish our required Mortality Review and to complete our Investigation. Attached below I have included a copy of the Certified Letter we sent to the Office of the Chief Medical Examiner. If you have any questions you can contact myself or our Staff Attorney at:
(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
Staff Attorney
CLC New York
Metropolitan Correctional Center
150 Park Row
New York, NY 10007
p: 646-836-(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
f. 646-836-7665
View: .msg attachment.dll.
Page 13331
DOJ-OGR-00026029

Hi (b)(6); (b)(7)(C),
per our conversation this morning I am sending you the Letter for requested information involving Mr. Jeffrey Epstein. We need the following: 1. Autopsy Report, 2. Discharge Summary Report, 3.
